name: Clash of Joy
description:
Clash of Joy is a funny casual PVP tower defense block game

PVP Defense block game
Almosts hundred of block to select, easy to play, hard to be expert.Aid, control, output, disrupt different types of blocks,some specific blcoks. even have additional buff bonuses.Build your Line-up，use strategy and wish your luck to beat your opponent.

【Feature】
-Summon blocks randomly against real time match up player.
-Upgrade blocks technology to gain ATK and strengthen other special ability.
-Two different mode,join PVP and Cooperation mode to against Monster.
-Different tactics to destroy monster or your opponent Line-up.
-Quick match, one match up cost about 3 minutes, who would be the last on the stage.
-Cooperation mode, Against monster and boss with your teammate, enjoy the joy of stack up block’s bonus effect.
-Cute design of Monsters and blocks, numerous tressour claim after fight.
